basic.description: Markov chains, birth and death processes, random walk problems, elementary renewal theory, Markov processes, Brownian motion and Poisson processes, queuing theory, branching processes. Given jointly with STAT 855*.
basic.subject: STAT
basic.title: Stochastic Processes & Applic

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     STAT353 or (STAT269 or STAT351) with permission of the Department).
